products.title: Splash Pearl 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Choose pearl splash to introduce elegant creams tones into your space. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Almond 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-vtb1456 fabric colour: almond material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash almond 89mm vertical blind in cream/brown.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash smoke blue is a chic smokey blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Oyster 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash oyster vertical blinds provide a beautiful and elegant finish when dressing windows. The fabric is an attractive, light, natural cream colour. This fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash cream vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant light cream fabric a beautiful neutral hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.
